definition: united in a confederacy or league, a person who joins with another in carrying out some plan (especially an unethical or illegal plan), to form a confederation with
details:
adjective
- united in a confederacy or league
= synonyms: allied
noun
- a person who joins with another in carrying out some plan (especially an unethical or illegal plan)
= synonyms: accomplice
- someone who assists in a plot
= synonyms: henchman, partner in crime, collaborator
verb
- to form a confederation with
= example: to form a confederation with
- to form a group or unite
= synonyms: band together
